title: Client crashed after forging a key
body: I forged a key and immediately received a message saying there was an issue with my connection and the option to shutdown or restart the client. I first chose restart and upon reaching the login screen got the same message. I proceeded to try to shutdown the client and relaunch but the same issue appeared. After trying this a few time the problem has persisted. My friend also attempted to forge a key after I stated it crashed my client and he has had the same issue.

replies.body: Has this issue passed or are you still experiencing it?
The problem has passed, I'm not sure when it resolved itself but it was working by this morning
